channel.title: CVE Feed for Necta LLC -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Necta LLC -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-3218|2024-09-16T19:05:35.972Z -- necta%20llc -- wifi%20mouse%20%28mouse%20server%29
item.description: Due to a reliance on client-side authentication, the WiFi Mouse (Mouse Server) from Necta LLC's authentication mechanism is trivially bypassed, which can result in remote code execution.
